thread.title: Renishaw on breaking down the barriers to metal 3D printing
thread.title_full: Renishaw on breaking down the barriers to metal 3D printing

title: Renishaw on breaking down the barriers to metal 3D printing
text:
Renishaw on breaking down the barriers to metal 3D printing 5 October 2015 Expand Rob Weston from Renishaw 's Additive Manufacturing Products Division, talks to TCT about the global engineering company's plans to introduce Renishaw Solution Centres to provide firms with the development, resources and equipment to take advantage of metal 3D printing. We also find out about how additive manufacturing is paving the way for new design freedoms and how we will see a more integrated approach to the technology in the future in order to overcome challenges and take full advantage of its capabilities. 
To keep up-to-date on all the latest videos from TCT Show make sure you subscribe to our YouTube channel . Tags
